title: Earth's Radiation Budget science meeting, Nov. 6-8 in Boulder, Colorado
content:
Earth’s Radiation Budget logo. Credit: NOAA
Earth’s Radiation Budget logo. Credit: NOAA
Registration is open for the Earth's Radiation Budget Science Meeting! The meeting will be held at NCAR/UCAR's Center Green Campus in Boulder, CO, from Nov. 6 to Nov. 8, 2023.
The purpose of this hybrid meeting is to introduce the climate science community to current and ongoing work supported by NOAA's Earth's Radiation Budget (ERB) Initiative; inform the community of recent avenues of research and sources of data; and, encourage collaborations and bring new researchers to the ERB community.
Click to read the full article
